sec.title: General
sec.p: It is necessary to verify that the requirements of this document have been incorporated in the design and manufacturing of rigs. Either one or a combination of the following shall be used to verify that the requirements of ClauseÂ 4 have been met:

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: as appropriate, testing by means of a method prescribed in the standard and referred to in any particular requirement;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: assessment of the contents of the documentation required to be kept by the manufacturer, for example evidence that bought-in components, such as windscreens, have been manufactured to the required standard.

sec.p: The manufacturer shall have a quality management system in place, such as ISO 9001.
